actionCalls.name: Set_Activation_Line_fields_for_automated_handling
actionCalls.label: Set Activation Line fields for automated handling

assignments.description: Update the check box field, File_Attached__c, = True
assignments.name: Set_File_Attached_c_To_True
assignments.label: Set File_Attached__c To True

decisions.description: We check if any files have been attached
decisions.name: Check_For_Attached_Files
decisions.label: Check For Attached Files

Flow.description: The summary page is includes all the information about the account, billing account, subscriptions and available and used addons information

formulas.name: DeliveryAddress
formulas.expression: {!Account.Name} & BR() & IF(ISBLANK( {!Account.Billing_Street_Name__c} ), '', ({!Account.Billing_Street_Name__c} & ' ' & {!Account.Billing_Street_Number__c} )) & IF(ISBLANK( {!Account.Billing_Floor_Number__c} ), '', (', ' & {!Account.Billing_Floor_Number__c} & BR())) & IF(ISBLANK( {!Account.Billing_Door_Number__c} ), '', IF((FIND('.', {!Account.Billing_Floor_Number__c})) > 0, (' ' & {!Account.Billing_Door_Number__c}), ('. ' & {!Account.Billing_Door_Number__c}) & BR())) & IF(ISBLANK( {!Account.BillingPostalCode} ), '', (', ' & {!Account.BillingPostalCode})) & IF(ISBLANK( {!Account.BillingCity} ), '', (' ' & {!Account.BillingCity} & BR() )) & IF(ISBLANK({!Account.BillingCountry}), '', (' ' & {!Account.BillingCountry} ))

Flow.label: Voice Flow - Summary

recordLookups.description: This should be replaced when all the subflows are connected, and this should be fetched from the previous flow
recordLookups.name: Quote_Lines
recordLookups.label: Quote Lines
